meanings.definition: The worship of one god without denying the existence of other gods.
meanings.sent1: Henotheism is when someone worships only one god but still believes in other gods.
meanings.sent2: In henotheism, followers focus on one god while acknowledging the presence of other deities.
meanings.sent3: At the henotheism gathering, they joked that their god was the best at parties.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to henotheism was like a lighthouse guiding her through life's storms.
meanings.sent5: The concept of henotheism can be compared to a tree with many branches, each representing a different god.

meanings.definition: The belief in and worship of a single god while accepting the existence of other gods.
meanings.sent1: Henotheism involves believing in one god while acknowledging the presence of other divine beings.
meanings.sent2: People who practice henotheism worship one god but recognize the existence of other gods.
meanings.sent3: The henotheism festival featured a play where all the gods competed in a talent show.
meanings.sent4: His commitment to henotheism was as strong as a mountain standing firm against the winds of doubt.
meanings.sent5: The idea of henotheism is like a colorful tapestry, with each thread representing a different deity.
